timeline.bodyText: This seemed like an easier way to go, since the messages don't actually have a HistoryReference from which to get the tags. However, tags are applied and counted from the same method 😀 (So if the counter is incremented then the tag was also applied.)
timeline.author: kingthorin

replies.bodyText: Not always, the counter might be incremented even when not tagged. The test class has the (mocked) HistoryReference set previously so it can be verified through that one (or just check the parent). These would be another tests anyway.
replies.author: thc202
